mapper.insert: INSERT INTO unicol_resume (RESUME_NO,resume_title,UserName,UserBirth,UserSex,UserEmail,UserTel,UserPhone, UserAdress, filename, filesize) VALUES (resume_seq.nextval, #{resume_title}, #{UserName}, #{UserBirth}, #{UserSex}, #{UserEmail}, #{UserTel}, #{UserPhone}, #{UserAdress}, #{filename}, #{filesize} )
